articles.title: Jury finds Alex Jones must pay $4.1 million for Sandy Hook hoax claims
articles.description: U.S. conspiracy theorist Alex Jones should pay parents of a child killed in the 2012 Sandy Hook massacre at least $4.1 million for falsely claiming the shooting was a hoax, a Texas jury said on Thursday.

articles.title: DeSantis suspends Tampa prosecutor who took stance against criminalizing abortion providers
articles.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis on Thursday suspended Tampa's elected prosecutor, Andrew Warren, for pledging not to use his office to go after people who seek and provide abortions or on doctors that provide gender affirming care to transgender people.
